thread.section_title: The Nadler Soho - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A classy oasis
thread.title_full: A classy oasis - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RTierney55
title: A classy oasis
text:
Our room was in the basement - which is often a bad thing. At the Nadler it was a very good thing. A great room, well appointed, in one of the best parts of London.
The staff were friendly, and helpful. Apart from one telephone contact which went a little awry they were very professional and welcoming.
There is no restaurant in the hotel, but Soho has more great restaurants than anyone could ever need. It's the right choice.
